Detailed Description

The Crystal interface to the Crystal direct achievement access API.

IMPORTANT NOTE: This API has a performance overhead for both the client application as well as the Crystal servers and requires the use of the network. Therefore this API should only be used for applications that wish to display the leaderboard data manually. Please do not rely on the Crystal Acheivement data for application features.

Member Function Documentation

Returns the shared singleton instance of CrystalLeaderboards.

Property Documentation
